option.value: Lhs - Border on the left-hand side of the table frame
Above - Border on the top side of the table frame
Void - Removes all outside table borders (default)
Box - Border on all sides of the table frame
Vsides - Border on the left and right sides of the table frame
Below - Border on the bottom side of the table frame
Border - Border on all sides of the table frame
Rhs - Border on the right-hand side of the table frame
Hsides - Border on the top and bottom sides of the table frame
Cols - Displays vertical borders between all table columns
Groups - Displays horizontal borders between all table groups
Rows - Displays horizontal borders between all table rows
None - Removes all interior table borders (default)
All - Displays a border on all rows and columns
